captions.text:
Johnny:
Is this the worst
you ever had to go boom-boom?
I shit my pants at the fair.

Oh, dude,
he's shitting right now.

Oh, get out, dude,
get out!

Come on, man,
get outta the fuckin' car.

I'm taking a cab
back to the hotel.
I need to go home right now.

What's that?
What are you doing?

I hope you didn't
take a shit

In that son
of a bitch.
You take a shit in there
You get to clean it out, pal.

title: Jackass: The Movie (3/10) Movie CLIP - Hardware Store Toilet (2002) HD

comments.author: Jackass Tv

comments.text:
When I ordered this on PPV back in the day, I literally almost died 
laughing at the "I shit my pants at the fair." line. I had to go outside 
for thirty minutes in the dead of winter and catch my breath. I'd never 
"lost" my breath like that before and I couldn't get it to come back, due 
in part to the fact that I couldn't stop laughing. Of course then I went 
back inside and finished watching the movie.

That's why people can say what they want to me about Jackass and I'll just 
say "whatever." It will forever be some of the most genuinely funny shit 
ever committed to film.﻿

comments.text:
Sorry folks, I hate to burst your bubble (insofar as van ride is concerned) 
as ole American expression goes: 'Been there, done that'!  I have extra 
semsitive intestines. thus IBS-D.  I have had more than my fair share of 
diarrhoea accidents and yes, even in vehicle! (Late friend once REFUSED on 
trip to stop so I could use loo, thus I wound up with ultimate results -- I 
wound up, thanks to him, shitting diarrhoea in my pants while on the 
road)!  I KNOW the feeling and embarrassment firsthand!﻿
